mapper.sql: shebeilishi_id, shebeilishi_shebeiid, shebeilishi_shebeijingdu, shebeilishi_shebeiweidu, shebeilishi_shebeisudu, shebeilishi_shebeishijian
mapper.insert:
insert into shebeilishi
shebeilishi_id,
shebeilishi_shebeiid,
shebeilishi_shebeijingdu,
shebeilishi_shebeiweidu,
shebeilishi_shebeisudu,
shebeilishi_shebeishijian,
#{shebeilishiId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{shebeilishiShebeiid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{shebeilishiShebeijingdu,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{shebeilishiShebeiweidu,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
#{shebeilishiShebeisudu,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{shebeilishiShebeishijian,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update shebeilishi
shebeilishi_shebeiid = #{shebeilishiShebeiid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
shebeilishi_shebeijingdu = #{shebeilishiShebeijingdu,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
shebeilishi_shebeiweidu = #{shebeilishiShebeiweidu,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
shebeilishi_shebeisudu = #{shebeilishiShebeisudu,jdbcType=INTEGER},
shebeilishi_shebeishijian = #{shebeilishiShebeishijian,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where shebeilishi_id = #{shebeilishiId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update shebeilishi set shebeilishi_shebeiid = #{shebeilishiShebeiid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, shebeilishi_shebeijingdu = #{shebeilishiShebeijingdu,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, shebeilishi_shebeiweidu = #{shebeilishiShebeiweidu,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, shebeilishi_shebeisudu = #{shebeilishiShebeisudu,jdbcType=INTEGER}, shebeilishi_shebeishijian = #{shebeilishiShebeishijian,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where shebeilishi_id = #{shebeilishiId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from shebeilishi s where s.shebeilishi_shebeiid=#{shebeiid,jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY s.shebeilishi_id desc limit 5
